data.actual_result: The fields only allow at max 20 characters to be inputted
data.expected_result: The fields should allow at least up to 32 characters, the username limit
data.short_description: Members & Bans search fields only allow up till 20 characters to be inputted
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Server Settings of a server you have permission to access the Members or Bans section in - Open one of the section - Tap on the search field and attempt to enter more than 20 characters into the field
